title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Label font size doesn't change immediately after it is modified in the UI.
OB: The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly when the font size is changed.
SR:
1. Add a label to the UI.
2. Modify the font size of the label to 18 points and observe the label height.
